project_path.SpookyShiba_V2: contracts/SpookyShiba Full Smart Contract Security Audit/SpookyShiba_V2

findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The function multiSendTokens() uses a loop to multitransfer, which can lead to an OUT_OF_GAS exception if there is a long addresses list.
